publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6062 Dr Richard Simpson: Excellent Work by the Scottish Driving Assessment Service—That the Parliament commends the excellent work of the Scottish Driving Assessment Service (SDAS), which has carried out over 12,000 assessments in its 25 years; notes the increasing number of referrals to SDAS and the consequential increase in waiting times; recognises the contribution of Citroën, Nissan, Ford and Toyota in lending SDAS vehicles, and believes that the timely provision of SDAS assessment, advice and support is an essential part of the administration.
